str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Mid. and pass: To make a compact (agreement) with (together), covenant with, agree.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To assert, affirm, profess. Prolongation from the same as phemi; to assert.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
